name: Charters of history
description:
This game takes place in the new world starting from the year 1680 when France started to settle The Mississippi area.  The story is only insipired by history and therefore it is not 100% correct, but i tried to keep as accurate as possible.

The Mississippi Company had a short but intresting history that you get to experience first hand. As the player you will settle cities, improve your current ones and explore lands. You will also get to read letters that explain this intresting story. As a tip remember to settle cities with good connections to your homeport since the speed of the trade routes affect the city maintenance.

This game is my first project made with Godot. Previously i have only made games with Unity and Godot proved to be a excelent engine that frustarated me less than Unity. 

ASSETS USED: 

https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/861

https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/collection/1484/blue-marble

PROGRAMS USED: 

Godot

Blender

Gimp

piskelapp.com
